website_summaries.verdict: With an all-metal valve design and a five-pound capacity, this is a reliable fire extinguisher that can knock down fires of varying origin and size. It’s a reliable unit that’s worth the extra cost.
pros: Good all-around product with a long discharge time of nearly 15 seconds
The valve is a completely metal construction
cons: Slightly more expensive than similar competitors
Some complaints of poor packaging during shipping, leading to the unit’s seal being broken upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Big and has metal parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the fireman wrote the other review about metal parts and the weight. Love the fire extinguisher and it will last a long time. Worth the money. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty queen

customer_reviews.title: ... handheld extinguisher for a long time but it's only good for a small pan fire
customer_reviews.text: I've had a small handheld extinguisher for a long time but it's only good for a small pan fire. After seeing (on This Old House) just how insanely fast a room can go up in flames (a mere 10-15 seconds!) I realized that I needed to get a REAL extinquisher ASAP. So I asked my cousin, who's a firefighter, what type and size I should have for my one bedroom apartment. He said "5 pound Class ABC extinguisher". That's what THIS is. I placed it centrally in my apartment and now I feel much more at ease.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item at the recommendation of the fireman on another product review. I've not tested it, but I'm glad I got this one. Sturdy metal handle /trigger, no need to worry about it breaking like with cheaper products constructed of plastic. I also like the fact that it is refillable. I'd like to get out and practice with this, but will have to find out where I can have it refilled first. Many thanks to the poster who recommended this product over the less expensive plastic-handled fire extinguishers. I was unaware of the differences in fire extinguisher constuction, and I feel much safer having been informed of such.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jean

customer_reviews.title: this was an unsafe item!!!
customer_reviews.text: The box was clearly resealed. The safety tug tight seal was broken and the gage was on recharge. Imagine if I has put it under the sink without looking at the gage and then needed it in an emergency!!! Amazon credited me the cost because it could not be returned. I took it to a fire safety co to refill and that is when I learned it was EMPTY. They would not refill. The owner took off the hose and showed me the residue powder in it. I asked for a supervisor to contact me but no one has. I bought a new one at the fire safety co but spent about $20.00 more. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 16 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality extinguisher but it is the lesser aluminum variant. For the brass/stainless alternative, get the B424 which currently runs just $5 more. Another option is to get the aluminum B402 which is slightly better than the B500 and is currently $20 less; a very good deal. UPDATE : Bought mine 16 months ago, never used it, and see the guage now shows 0 psi. Not sure how to go about refilling it but there's no way this nearly $70 extinguisher should be useless after just over a year in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Troy L.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than thought. Still great.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a larger size. See size compared to 1/2 gallon of milk. It is fire engine red, just poor lighting. Seems like a high quality unit. 14 seconds of sprey. I hope that's enough if I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: L.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Should be required
customer_reviews.text: You should Always have a fire extinguisher handy - at home and in all of your cars! This is a good priced all-class extinguisher, perfect for any emergency! Twice in my life I have had an engine fire on the road. Having one of these handy saved my car in both cases and at least once saved another motorist, keeping the repairs minor as opposed to losing them completely! They last for years with an easy to read gauge to let you know when they need refilling / replacement.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowCat

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Hoped I would never have to use it, but I’m glad I bought this. Put out a grill fire quickly and efficiently saving my patio and possibly part of my house. Already ordered a second one to replace it. Can not recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my tenants for my investment property
customer_reviews.text: I shipped this fire extinguisher directly to my tenants and had my property manager bring it to a place to be tagged. I received a phone call from the fire company letting me know my "new" fire extinguisher is dated 2016! That's 2 years off the lifespan of what was purchased as new.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Partially Discharged Upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: My extinguisher came partially discharged. The gray plastic strap that I assume protects this from happening was loose in the box. Disappointed that I will now have an errand to recharge this thing.
customer_reviews.author: JPL

customer_reviews.title: Lost pressure in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Bought only a little more than a year ago and it already needs to be recharged. I have another much cheaper extinguisher that cost less than half as much that I’ve had far longer and it’s still good to go. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katharina

customer_reviews.title: Dependable highly-rated brand. Rechargeable.
customer_reviews.text: This type is a bit more expensive because it's made with metal parts. Cheap fire extinguishers made with plastic valves leak. This one's metal valve isn't as likely to leak - which means it'll work if/when needed. If the pressure zeroes out over time, it's rechargeable. Cheap fire extinguishers with plastic valves aren't rechargeable. When they lose their pressure you have to toss them. This fire extinguisher arrived fully pressurized and in excellent condition. Comes with a metal hook (for wall hanging if desired). Some upgrades are totally worth it. :) Consider what this item is intended to protect - you, your family, and your property. Dependability was my first consideration. Secondarily, recyclability was important to me too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Topping

customer_reviews.title: It did exactly what it was designed to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fire extinguisher a couple days before I ended up having a wave running ignite fuel vapors while I was working on it. this fire extinguisher did it’s job and probably saved my business from burning to the ground. I might have received some bad burns but without this very important item doing it’s job I would have lost my business, equipment and my customers wave runners .
customer_reviews.author: Brimhall

customer_reviews.title: Device 💯; shipping method has some kinks
customer_reviews.text: The extinguisher arrived; condition looks excellent. Pressure gauge reads right in the middle of the desired zone. The zip tie intended to hold the pin in place during shipping was destroyed, so it was only luck that prevented the pin from falling out and suppression chemical being sprayed all over the inside of the box. Still, it arrived in one piece with all of the chemical on the inside. I would suggest using a stronger zip tie for shipping. They're inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreviewer123321

customer_reviews.title: It’s great when you get it, but doesn’t stand the test of time
customer_reviews.text: being an ABC extinguisher is great, and the size is great as well. unfortunately, losing pressurization after 2 years is not. i bought a buckeye extinguisher at the same time and it’s going strong still, so i’ll be chucking this one and buying another buckeye.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived discharged - no return option available
customer_reviews.text: I guess when you buy these you just roll the dice and hope that the extinguisher you get doesn't arrive damaged or discharged. Upon opening the package, a bunch of yellow dust fell out of the bottom as the extinguisher had discharged in transit. And there's no return option available. Great. $55 well spent. Thanks, Jeff. Maybe it would have been a good fire extinguisher. Maybe not. If you're thinking of buying this fire extinguisher, I highly recommend doing it in-person.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality extinguisher, packaging could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I'm offering a review on the aesthetics of this extinguisher as I have not used it. It is well built and looks sharp. It ships with a steel bracket for hanging it, and I appreciated its simple design, with a hook/ring connector. There is a plastic band protecting accidental activation of the lever... We wondered if it could be broken without tools in time of crisis. On closer inspection, it seems intentionally breakable. The box it was shipped in arrived with corner holes and significant damage. There wasn't much packing material within the box, so the heavy metal items within, combined with open space, really challenged the cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Homer

customer_reviews.title: Seems legit
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult to write a review on a fire extinguisher you purchased, before you’ve ever had to use it. This review is mostly based on appearance, the weight of it, and the assumption that it contains what it says it contains so it will put out a fire should we ever need to use it. It looks and feels like the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Quite a bit of discharge in the box when first arriving.
customer_reviews.text: Like the headline said there was quite a bit of discharge to the point the whole extinguisher was covered in it. The little plastic bit that holds the pin in had broke and caused the pin to fall out which in turn caused the discharge. The gauge on the extinguisher still top dead center in the green though so it's not bad. I originally bought this to use in my racecar but found out upon arrival it's WAY too big for the car. I should've done my research on it but it's all OK because I can always use an extra extinguisher for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A nice big unit which gives me a little more confidence
customer_reviews.text: A nice big unit which gives me a little more confidence. I saw on answered questions that the seller states this comes with a wall mounting bracket. Mine did not. Also, I didn't find anything which serves to keep the safety pin in place. I will have to work something out because I don't want to discharge it accidentally when I pick it up. I hope I never have to use it, but I feel better having it.
customer_reviews.author: Pg

customer_reviews.title: From a firefighter prospective awesome product
customer_reviews.text: From a firefighters perspective. I keep it in my truck in the tool box along my other tools I carry around. I was headed to work today and stopped at a gas station at a major intersection in my area and I was walking out when I noticed a car engine bay on fire in the center of the intersection and had just enough spray time to knock the fire down while at the same time making sure those in the car were safely out of the car buying another one and getting my second one refilled better to have more then needed than not enough Great product all around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than predicted. Better quality than assumed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great home use extinguisher, albeit a bit heavier than predicted. We keep it convenient to the kitchen and fireplace. I can set it in front of the fireplace, aim the nozzle up the chimney and let 'er rip, in case of a chimney fire, for instance. I feel better having it than not.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zinn

customer_reviews.title: -the real deal mini-extinguisher...
customer_reviews.text: -these are the real deal, just like the standard full-sized ones you see, only smaller, around and height. -seem to be excellent, good quality product, refillable, soft flexible hose, metal pull pin... just the right size, good balance between weight and usefulness. -small enough to fit under the kitchen sink, and still large enough to be able to fight a good sized fire if need be, one for the shed, one for the basement, one for the kitchen, one for the garage. -comes with a metal bracket for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: jcc

customer_reviews.title: Light weight / Great power
customer_reviews.text: The Amerex B500 fire extinguisher is a good home unit because of light weight, 5 pounds of fire killing chemical , and it can put out A,B,or C rated fires. Great size for kitchen use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stearns

customer_reviews.title: This fire extinguisher doesn’t mess around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the other good reviews here. It’s clearly the Mac daddy of all other fire extinguishers. Very sturdy and built like a tank! I hope I never need to use it, but having it gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 5 star rating even though I have not used it yet, thank goodness (5 stars because I sleep better, and have fulfilled my insurance obligation). The handle is metal, apparently a major plus, as no one needs product failure during an emergency. My house insurance, probably like yours, requires my having a fire extinguisher, and if I suffer a fire, I want to have both a fire extinguisher at the time and, when filing a claim, proof that I had one. These promise 14 seconds of use, so be sure everyone in your household reads the simple instructions.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalNow

customer_reviews.title: Same unit at half the price
customer_reviews.text: After Christmas I found an identical fire extinguisher for half the price at Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: What can I say
customer_reviews.text: Essentially we had to buy one of these for our cafe, the model we had wasn't correct so we needed this one. Not much to say, fire extinguishers are what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin C. Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for our new home, based on positive reviews. Haven't had to use them (that's a good thing) so no word on how they work. Packaging is flimsy and both arrived with external box damage. Security seal was broken on one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Terry

customer_reviews.title: Metal valve
customer_reviews.text: Now THIS is a fire extinguisher. Metal valve and Amerex quality. Those Kiddie extinguishers use plastic and have recalls galore. PLUS, this is a 5 pound unit. How much is your house/life worth??
customer_reviews.author: david murphy

customer_reviews.title: I hope it works when I need it
customer_reviews.text: I researched these some and came to this one. I can't speak on if it works well or not and hopefully I never have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Quality, heavy-duty looking thing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted specifically to get an Amerex like the industrial shops and big businesses rely on but sadly found only cheap versions in stores with plastic handles and they were all overpriced, so I went online. The product came like promised, pressurized and with no accidental discharge. I assume it is filled with the retardant so I am quite happy. If it lasts as long as some reviewers claim, it might be the last one I ever need to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, bit heavier to use than I expected. Also didn't expect there to be so much powder in the mix. But I can not argue with the results. Good item, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zarium

customer_reviews.title: Gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: This extinguisher is fairly heavy which gives me the impression that it holds a lot of the good stuff to put fires out. It comes with a small bracket so that you can hang it from a wall. This is case where you hope you never need to use something. But when you do need it, you're very glad you have it. I'm glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdGen

customer_reviews.title: Get one just in case.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it covers almost any kind of home fire I could be careless enough to start.
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great, certainly better than nothing! Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hope I never have to use it, glad I can get something like this on Amazon or I may not have one. Very good;
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Basic and good!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it asks to rate stretch... but this is a good basic model like the others I have used
customer_reviews.author: G. Mckibbon

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 one was missing the hook to hang from wall. Need the hook. Overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately - I am not able to review this from the standpoint of a guy who had to actually use it to put out a fire - but the product seems very sturdy. I purposely bought this one on the recommendation of an article that said to get an extinguisher with a metal mechanism (as opposed to plastic). There's some products you just don't want to skimp on - right?
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: The real deal, apparently.  Solidly built.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had occasion to use this, but it seems like exactly what you'd want if there is a fire at home. This is what you remember fire extinguishers being. Very solid; not one of the toy extinguishers that seem to be the only other choices. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Raknox

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: The plastic things that go around that we put were broke but we used something else
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This is great to have as a safety precaution in the home
customer_reviews.text: This is great to have as a safety precaution in the home. I showed my son how to use it, and we took the opportunity to review what to do in case of a fire in the home. After seeing a friend lose everything in a fire that might have been put out quicker had they an extinguisher, I ordered this. I feel safer having it in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to rate and review
customer_reviews.text: something you hope you'll never have to use. Canister is sturdy, looks easy to use. It's a peace of mind purchase that everyone should consider.
customer_reviews.author: Mora

customer_reviews.title: This is made to save lives.
customer_reviews.text: One of your best choices for a 5lb home extinguisher. Comes with a wall mount. Don't cheap out on one of these and keep it accessible.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: We had a fire today and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Well we had a kitchen fire today. I bought this a year and a half ago of course hoping never to use it. It worked perfectly and we had no extensive damage. I had to use most of it and it did the job. Most of all my family is safe. I just purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and needed. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction. Feels good to have it ready
customer_reviews.text: Solid, all metal construction (as far as I can tell). Have always bought Amerex extinguishers.
customer_reviews.author: SforSancho

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Not having had the opportunity to actually try this extinguisher out, it seems well made, sturdy, and a worthwhile investment. It arrived well packed, in good shape, and the charge was in the green zone. I hope I never have to use it in seriousness.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Long

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Extinguisher it's self is excellent. No Bracket - Pin retainer broken. Pin won't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel safer now
customer_reviews.text: It will definitely take care of home fire, safety first!
customer_reviews.author: joyma

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for under the kitchen sink. It is sturdy, has directions right on it, and looks straightforward to use. I hope I never need it, but I’m confident that if I do it will perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy's own in Household

customer_reviews.title: good extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: Seem good I havent had to use it as yet
customer_reviews.author: Bruce lada

customer_reviews.title: Commercial and Residential Use
customer_reviews.text: Used this brand and type for commercial warehouse and office settings. Just bought this now for my residential use. Visually inspect monthly per OSHA requirements.
customer_reviews.author: GLR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome extinquisher.
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome fire extinguisher. I have a couple of smaller ones but wanted a good one for the garage/work shop. This one definitely fills the bill. It wasn't cheap but you get what you pay for and I recommend it to anybody who needs this type of extinguisher.
customer_reviews.author: MadMax

customer_reviews.title: Cadillac of extinguishers
customer_reviews.text: Cadillac of extinguishers. After some research I learned that you can buy some a little cheaper, but they are of much less quality. For my budget, this is perfect for my home and soon my rental units. If you're buying more than one, better to buy bare price and add shipping...IOW, not free shipping; you'll save a few bucks. I'm planning to buy 3 or 4 more.
customer_reviews.author: Renee'

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great extinguisher just what I needed for around the house can't go wrong with this and it has a little hanger.
customer_reviews.author: albert marshall

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Keep this in my pickup always never know when you might save a life.
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Product looks nice and industrial
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice and industrial. Only issue is some of the tamper cord/seals holding the pull pin broke off. The manufacturer should include an extra tamper cord in every box just in case. Side note I bought from GoSafetyUSA and they acknowledged the issue I had and quickly sent over extra tamper cords for me.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Sleep better at night -- buy quality fire bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my aging home extinguishers with this one. Haven't "auditioned" it yet, and no plans to ever do so. Purchased on advice from a fire-fighter friend who said to avoid any extinguishers with plastic, as he's seen some failures in those cheaper units.
customer_reviews.author: DougJustDoug

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: No comment on actual use (since I haven't had to use either of the units mentioned), but... as others have noted, this Amerex seems to be built very well. You can tell just by looking at it...everything is heavy duty, especially compared to the Kidde I already have in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Fra

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our condo. Met all state qualifications for rental property.
customer_reviews.author: cindy dienes

customer_reviews.title: Rating something you hope you never use
customer_reviews.text: If I have a fire, I'll let you know how effective this is. But if it is ineffective, then I will probably have been consumed by the flames, and I will not be able to give it an unacceptable rating.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Hine

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Kidde with These
customer_reviews.text: Replace my defective Kidde extinguishers with these. Have never had to use an extinguisher "in anger" so I have no real-world experiences to share ... but I'm ready if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Herrington

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU
customer_reviews.text: Soooooooooooooooooooooo appreciate your taking the time to resend to my home since we're on mandatory stay at home. We received it and once we're back @ the office, I will look forward to getting back to the office and installing!!!!!! Thank you SO MUCH Again!!! Stay safe & healthy!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa/Noble Gold

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, ready for use, hope I don't have to.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say if this is any good until used, but was very good quality product, came fully charged, with hanger hook and as shown. Higher rated than most other ABC units and at a very good price point. Is also rechargeable when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Baltojeff

customer_reviews.title: Guess it is safer to buy things like this local
customer_reviews.text: This item took forever to arrive. When we open the box white powder was everywhere! The nozzle was broken off as well. The powder made the person that opened the package sick and we had to throw it away. Guess it is safer to buy things like this local. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Barco

customer_reviews.title: inspection tag present along with easy to read instructions
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in tact.No damage, inspection tag present along with easy to read instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Starr

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty construction and arrived in good condition. The instructions on how to install and ...
customer_reviews.text: The two fire extinguishers are exactly what I wanted. Heavy duty construction and arrived in good condition. The instructions on how to install and use were easy to read and follow.
customer_reviews.author: Norm's mom

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Never used, but I have bought three for the garage. These are the same ones we have at work, which gives me confidence that they're adequate for my home needs.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure and Coffee

customer_reviews.title: It’s heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very dependable. I believe it’s the best fire extinguisher for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan E. Clagett

customer_reviews.title: Good extinguisher for the home
customer_reviews.text: Did lots of research and this one was consistently ranked as one of the best for it's price and size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Loose retaining pin on 2 of 2
customer_reviews.text: We use these at work and I know they're good extinguishers. I bought 2 for the house after using 1 during the recent fires in Ventura - 1 arrived OK, the other had discharged in the box. The retaining ring that prevents the handle from activating was loose on both extinguishers, 1 evidently fell on its "head" and blew part of its load.
customer_reviews.author: jh in socal

customer_reviews.title: Seen great reviews on this hope I never have to use them .but great confidence  in the product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery good price hope I never have to use them but seen great reviews
customer_reviews.author: michael bramble

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: It did arrive as promised. Hope I;ll never need to use it
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have , just in case.
customer_reviews.text: Well made unit with metal trigger and it can be refilled if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Fan

customer_reviews.title: Decent and reasonable price. As a firefighter, I ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent and reasonable price. As a firefighter, I can attest to the prudence of having extinguishers in home and vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: The Electron Wizard

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE YOU LIVE NEAR A PLACE TO GET IT RECHARGED.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in 2016. I didn't see anyplace in the description that it had to be recharged, but regardless, when we received it, we realized it had to be recharged every so often and didn't think that was a big deal. For us it is...we would have to send it to Alpena, or Grand Rapids to have it charged! We didn't even know it needed recharging till the other day when I told hubby, we better turn it upside down and then right side up. That's when he noticed it said it was time to recharge it. So, we'll be looking for a different one that does not have to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and with clear instructions ! I haven’t used it (knock on wood) but it’s full and ready to be used !
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: It has sturdy metal components and it’s rechargeable. Failures are more common with plastic-handled extinguishers, so I’m told
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to replace expired fire extinguishers and they arrived quickly and they were a great price. Seem to be same quality as the ones our local fire protection company tried to sell us, but saved significantly on these.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Walton

customer_reviews.title: Fills the need
customer_reviews.text: Needed fire extinguishers which weren't plastic triggers, and we're at least 5lbs. This fit the bill nicely. Also picked up a "K" rated extinguisher for the kitchen. Haven't used this yet (touch wood), but tested it and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping...
customer_reviews.text: Really can't say anything until I need it...and I hope I never will...
customer_reviews.author: GregG

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I took this to get inspected and th yes were impressed that these were 2020 editions.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: But the exterior looks great and is the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Haven't needed it yet and I hope we never will. But the exterior looks great and is the perfect size. You can typically expect about 2 second of discharge for every pound, so this extinguisher should spray for about 10 seconds. In my opinion, you shouldn't even consider anything less than 5lb.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I was very glad i had this handy it could have ruined our ...
customer_reviews.text: Helped me put out a small BBQ grease fire. I was very glad i had this handy it could have ruined our entire weekend otherwise.

customer_reviews.text: I hope I never need it but I'm glad I have it. I mounted it to a tractor. It seams to be made of solid construction and should be ready in time of need.

customer_reviews.text: This is a REAL fire extinguisher. Came fully charged and is perfect for an entire NY apartment. Shopped a long time to find this one. Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: haven't had a chance to try it out yet, ...
customer_reviews.text: haven't had a chance to try it out yet, and really hope i never have to. Make sure to get these refilled as the pressure drains out of the system over time. I think it lasted a over a year+ before it needed a refill.

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks solid, well made. No plastic. Of a size large enough to do some good, but small enough to stow unobtrusively in the kitchen or handy to the fireplace.

customer_reviews.text: I had a small kitchen fire (something on the stove caught fire and it spread to the bottom of the microwave range), and it put out the fire.

customer_reviews.text: Item arrived undamaged and as advertised. Has a good manual and appears well designed. Fortunately I have not had to use it yet.... So it is difficult to say any more than this.

product_meta.title: Amerex B500, 5lb ABC Dry Chemical Class A B C Fire Extinguisher
product_meta.description: Amerex ABC Extinguishers effectively fight Class A, B, and C fires and are a popular choice for offices, warehouses, homes, and more. Steel cylinders and all-metal valves make these rugged, dependable extinguishers. They are easy to maintain and service, making them an economical choice too.
feature_bullets: ABC Dry Chemical, Class A:B:C Extinguisher
All metal valve construction, Aluminum Valve
For use on Class A (ordinary combustibles), Class B (Flammable liquid) spills or Fires involving live electrical equipment (Class C)
